title: Fix Order tab navigation not responding

requirements.summary: Fix the Order tab in the bottom navigation bar so that clicking it successfully navigates to the Order/order-taking page with proper route highlighting
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Order tab in the bottom navigation bar navigates to the /order page
The Order tab is visually highlighted as active when on the /order route
No console errors are thrown when clicking the Order tab
The OrderTaking page renders correctly after navigation
Navigation between Order, Menu, and Reports tabs all function without issues

file_operations.description: Fix the Order tab navigation by ensuring the Link component's 'to' prop correctly points to '/order', verify the isActive logic properly highlights the Order tab when on the /order route, and ensure all navigation links use consistent TanStack Router Link components with proper activeProps for visual feedback. Verify that no event handlers are blocking navigation and that the component structure allows click events to propagate correctly.

Verify the /order route is correctly registered in the TanStack Router configuration with the OrderTaking component, ensure the route path matches the navigation link target exactly ('/order'), and confirm the route is not conditionally rendered or blocked by any guards. Remove or adjust the root redirect from '/' to '/order' if it interferes with direct /order navigation, ensuring the Order route is accessible from all navigation contexts.

Review and ensure the OrderTaking page component exports correctly as the default export, verify it does not have any initialization errors that would prevent rendering, confirm all hooks and queries are properly configured to handle loading states without throwing errors, and ensure the component renders a stable UI even when menu data is still loading. Add error boundaries or fallback states if needed to prevent navigation failures.
